summary: Sir Paul Nurse PRS  is a British geneticist and cell biologist.
full_text: Sir Paul Maxime Nurse FRS FREng , is an English geneticist, former President of the Royal Society and Chief Executive and Director of the Francis Crick Institute. He was awarded the 2001 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine along with Leland Hartwell and Tim Hunt for their discoveries of protein molecules that control the division  of cells in the cell cycle.
title: Paul Nurse
